verses.name: Genesis 37:27
verses.text: Come, and let us sell him to the Ishmeelites, and let not our hand be upon him; for he is our brother and our flesh. And his brethren were content.

verses.name: Genesis 37:28
verses.text: Then there passed by Midianites merchantmen; and they drew and lifted up Joseph out of the pit, and sold Joseph to the Ishmeelites for twenty pieces of silver: and they brought Joseph into Egypt.

verses.name: Genesis 37:29
verses.text: And Reuben returned unto the pit; and, behold, Joseph was not in the pit; and he rent his clothes.
